name: transaction
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool binance_smart_chain.
Tool description: All-In-One access to the BSC blockchain data!

More features are coming soon!

Feedback and feature requests should be sent to:
angleitnerchristoph123@gmail.com
API description: Fetches full data for a specific transaction on the Optimism blockchain.

hash.description: The hash of the transaction to scan.

network.description: The network to use (mainnet or testnet). Defaults to None.
